author: cms-tau-pog
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is to remove depreciated DNN-based tau-Ids: DPFIsolation (a dedicated module) and DeepTauID v1 (a v1-related part of the deepTauId module). These tau-Ids was superseded by deepTauID v2 and are not present in official workflows.

In addition two outdated and unused modules are also removed.

No changes are expected.

This PR is accompanied by another PR to cms-data removing model files of removed DNN-based tau-Ids (https://github.com/cms-data/RecoTauTag-TrainingFiles/pull/9) or its updated version https://github.com/cms-data/RecoTauTag-TrainingFiles/pull/10.

This is backport of #38063.

#### PR validation:

Limited matrix tests successful in original PR (#38063). Not repeated here as differences between master and 12_4_X are minimal (can be done on request).

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Backport of #38063.

Removal of outdated code and (more importantly) reduction of size of cms-distr thanks to removal of old model files when https://github.com/cms-data/RecoTauTag-TrainingFiles/pull/9 merged. Finally it enables adding to cms-distr of 12_4_X new model files of newest deepTauID v2p5 requested in https://github.com/cms-data/RecoTauTag-TrainingFiles/pull/10.
title: Remove depreciated DNN-based tau-Ids [12_4_X]
